get.description: Retrieves all fund counterparty margins for a specified session date.
Fetches all fund family <-> funds relations maps.
Fetches all available risk measures for funds on a specified effective date.

parameters.name: enabledOnly
parameters.description: Returns only funds that are currently enabled.

parameters.name: fetchCharacteristics
parameters.description: Fetches all characteristics for each fund.

get.description: Fetches all available fund NAV entries for a given date or period.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: A specific date. Use either this or the range parameters.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date of the range.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date of the range.

parameters.name: fundId
parameters.description: The fund identifier. Optional.

parameters.name: fetchCharacteristics
parameters.description: Returns characteristics for all institutions.

parameters.name: fetchNomenclatures
parameters.description: Returns nomenclatures for all institutions.

parameters.name: fetchCharacteristics
parameters.description: Fetches all characteristics for each instrument group.

parameters.name: fetchNomenclatures
parameters.description: Fetches all nomenclatures for each instrument group.

parameters.name: enabled-only
parameters.description: Returns only instruments that are currently enabled.

parameters.name: fetch-characteristics
parameters.description: Fetches all characteristics for each instrument.

parameters.name: fetch-group
parameters.description: Fetches all instrument groups and their characteristics.When combined with fetchCharacteristics, applies hierarchical resolution to characteristics.

parameters.name: fetch-baskets
parameters.description: Fetches all baskets associated with the instruments. Default false.

parameters.name: fetch-issuers
parameters.description: Fetches all issuers associated with the instruments. Default false.

parameters.name: fetch-cash-flows
parameters.description: Fetches all cash flows associated with the instruments. Default false.

parameters.name: fetch-nomenclatures
parameters.description: Fetches all nomenclatures associated with the instruments. Default false.

get.description: Fetches all available instrument parameters used in characteristics, including those applied to instrument groups.

parameters.name: fetchCharacteristics
parameters.description: Returns characteristics for all issuers.

get.description: Retrieves detailed PnL explain entries for a specified date range, fund family, and set of discriminators.

parameters.name: start-date
parameters.description: The inclusive start date for the PnL explain data range.

parameters.name: end-date
parameters.description: The inclusive end date for the PnL explain data range.

parameters.name: fund-family
parameters.description: The fund family identifier to filter the PnL explain data.

parameters.name: discriminator
parameters.description: A list of property names to group or filter the PnL explain data by. At least one property name is required.

get.description: Fetches all position entries a given date.

parameters.name: positionDate
parameters.description: The position date. If not provided, evaluates to today.

parameters.name: isOpen
parameters.description: If true, fetches open position for a given date. Otherwise, returns close position.

get.description: Fetches all prices for a given date.

parameters.name: priceDate
parameters.description: The price date.

parameters.name: priceTypeName
parameters.description: The price type.

get.description: Fetches all prices for a given date and a given instrument.

parameters.name: priceDate
parameters.description: The price date.

parameters.name: priceTypeName
parameters.description: The price type.

get.description: Fetches all risk factor values for a given date.

parameters.name: valuation-date
parameters.description: The target valuation date.

get.summary: Get All Risk Factor Value Types
get.description: Fetches all risk factor values types.
Fetches all trades for a given date.

parameters.name: effectiveDate
parameters.description: The effective date. If not provided, evaluates to today.

instrumentId.description: The instrument ID to override the price for.

riskFactorId.description: The ID of the risk factor to be overridden. Use this or the risk factor name.

riskFactor.description: The name of the risk factor to be overridden. Use this or the risk factor ID.
